schemas.description: Access NFT collections including ERC721 and ERC1155 tokens with metadata, images, and collection details across EVM chains.

getCollectiblesEVM.description: Get NFT collectibles (ERC721/ERC1155) with metadata, images, and collection details for a wallet address.

schemas.name: Sim by Dune - Token Holders
schemas.description: Discover token distribution across ERC20 or ERC721 holders, ranked by wallet value.

getTokenHoldersEVM.description: Get token holders for ERC20 or ERC721 tokens, ranked by wallet value with balance details.

schemas.name: Sim by Dune - Token Info
schemas.description: Access token metadata including symbol, name, decimals, USD price, and logo URLs for native and ERC20 tokens across EVM chains.

getTokenInfoEVM.description: Get token metadata including symbol, name, decimals, USD price, and logo URLs for native and ERC20 tokens.

schemas.name: Sim by Dune - Transactions
schemas.description: Retrieve granular transaction details including block information, gas data, and raw values, ordered by descending block time.

getTransactionsEVM.description: Get detailed transaction history for an EVM address across supported chains, with block data and gas information.

schemas.name: Sim by Dune - SVM Transactions
schemas.description: Retrieve detailed transaction history for SVM addresses including block information, ordered by descending block time.

getTransactionsSVM.description: Get detailed transaction history for an SVM address, ordered by descending block time with pagination support.

schemas.name: SMARD Energy Data API
schemas.description: German energy market data from SMARD (Strommarktdaten) by Bundesnetzagentur. Provides electricity generation, consumption, and market data.

getFilterIndex.description: Get available timestamps for a SMARD data filter. Filter IDs: 1223=realized generation, 1224=forecasted generation, 1225=total grid load, 4169=installed capacity.

getLatestData.description: Get the latest energy data for a filter. Automatically fetches the most recent timestamp from the index. Filter IDs: 1223=realized generation, 1224=forecasted generation, 1225=total grid load.

schemas.name: Snapshot DAO Proposals
schemas.description: Query the Snapshot governance protocol via GraphQL — list DAO spaces, browse proposals, and retrieve detailed proposal information including votes and outcomes.

listSpaces.description: Fetch a list of available Snapshot spaces. Returns structured JSON response data.

listProposals.description: Fetch recent proposals for a given Snapshot space. Returns structured JSON response data.

getProposalDetails.description: Fetch detailed information for a specific proposal via Snapshot. Returns structured JSON response data.

schemas.name: TokenStatsAPI
schemas.description: Provides detailed statistics for tokens and token-pool pairs over multiple time intervals.

tokenStats.description: Get detailed stats for a token over various time intervals.

tokenStatsByPool.description: Get detailed stats for a token-pool pair over various time intervals.

schemas.name: TokenChartAPI
schemas.description: Retrieve OHLCV candlestick and holder distribution chart data from Solana Tracker for specific tokens and pools on the Solana blockchain.

chartData.description: Get OHLCV (Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) chart data for a token.

chartDataByPool.description: Get OHLCV chart data for a specific token in a specific pool. Required: token, pool. Optional filters: type, time_from, time_to, marketCap, removeOutliers.

schemas.name: PnL Analytics API
schemas.description: Retrieve profit and loss analytics for Solana wallets via Solana Tracker — full PnL breakdown, per-token PnL, and first-buyer analysis for any wallet address.

profitAndLossData.description: Get Profit and Loss data for all positions of a wallet.

pnlForSpecificToken.description: Get Profit and Loss data for a specific token in a wallet.

firstBuyers.description: Get the first 100 buyers of a token, with full PnL breakdown per wallet. Required: token.

schemas.name: TokenPriceAPI
schemas.description: Solana token price data via Solana Tracker — real-time prices, historical prices, price at specific timestamps, price ranges, and batch multi-token queries.

priceInformation.description: Get price information for a single token.

postPrice.description: Similar to GET /price, but accepts token address in the request body.

multiPriceInformation.description: Get price information for multiple tokens (up to 100).

getHistoricPrice.description: Get historic price points for a token (3d, 5d, 7d, 14d, 30d).

getPriceAtTimestamp.description: Get price at a specific timestamp for a token.

getPriceRange.description: Get lowest and highest prices for a token within a time range.

postMultiPrice.description: Get price info for multiple tokens (POST version).

schemas.name: TokenAPI
schemas.description: Provides endpoints for retrieving information about tokens, their holders, search capabilities, and statistical metrics like volume and trending status.

tokenInformation.description: Retrieve all information for a specific token.

tokenHolders.description: Get the top 100 holders for a specific token.

topTokenHolders.description: Get top 20 token holders via Solana Tracker — query by tokenAddress. Returns structured JSON response data.

allTimeHighPrice.description: Get all-time high price of a token via Solana Tracker — query by tokenAddress. Returns structured JSON response data.

tokensByDeployer.description: Get all tokens deployed by a specific wallet via Solana Tracker — query by wallet.

search.description: Advanced token search with filtering and pagination via Solana Tracker. Supports page, limit, minLiquidity filters.

multipleTokens.description: Get multiple tokens by array of addresses (max 20) via Solana Tracker. Returns structured JSON response data.

trendingTokens.description: Get the top 100 trending tokens based on transaction volume in the past hour.

tokensByVolume.description: Get top 100 tokens by volume (default timeframe) via Solana Tracker. Returns structured JSON response data.

tokenOverview.description: Overview of latest, graduating, and graduated tokens via Solana Tracker. Returns structured JSON response data.

graduatedTokens.description: Overview of all graduated tokens (Pumpvision/Moonshot) via Solana Tracker. Returns structured JSON response data.

tokenByPool.description: Get token by pool address via Solana Tracker — query by poolAddress. Returns structured JSON response data.

trendingTokensByTimeframe.description: Get trending tokens by specific timeframe (e.g., 5m, 24h) via Solana Tracker — query by timeframe.

tokensByVolumeTimeframe.description: Get top 100 tokens by volume for a specific timeframe via Solana Tracker — query by timeframe.

schemas.name: TopTradersAPI
schemas.description: Provides access to the most profitable traders across all tokens, with support for pagination and token-specific queries.

topTradersAll.description: Get the most profitable traders across all tokens via Solana Tracker. Supports expandPnl, sortBy filters.

topTradersAllPaged.description: Get the most profitable traders across all tokens, paginated by page number. Required: page.

topTradersByToken.description: Get the top 100 most profitable traders for a specific token. via Solana Tracker.

schemas.name: TokenTradeTracker
schemas.description: Retrieve Solana DEX trade data via Solana Tracker — latest trades by token, pool, wallet, or combination. Supports pagination and Jupiter parse mode.

tokenTrades.description: Get the latest trades for a token across all pools.

tradesByWallet.description: Get the latest trades for a specific token and wallet address.

tokenPoolTrades.description: Get the latest trades for a specific token and pool via Solana Tracker — query by tokenAddress and poolAddress.

userPoolTrades.description: Get the latest trades for a specific token, pool, and user via Solana Tracker — query by tokenAddress and poolAddress and owner.

schemas.name: WalletExplorer
schemas.description: Query Solana wallet data via Solana Tracker — token balances with USD values, recent trades, and paginated portfolio views for any wallet address.

walletInformation.description: Get all tokens in a wallet with current value in USD.

walletTokensBasic.description: Lightweight version: token balances and values without full metadata. Required: owner.

walletTokensPaged.description: Paginated version: fetch wallet tokens page by page (250 per page). Required: owner, page.

walletTrades.description: Get the latest trades of a wallet.

schemas.name: SolscanChainInfo
schemas.description: Fetch general Solana blockchain information via Solscan — current block height, transaction count, TPS, total supply, and network health metrics.

chainInfo.description: Returns Solana blockchain information such as block height and transaction count.

schemas.name: SolSniffer
schemas.description: Analyze Solana token security via SolSniffer — assess contract risks, detect rug-pull indicators, check mint authority, and retrieve token safety scores.

analysisToken.description: Analyze a Solana token using its address and return risk and token metadata. Required: token_address.

schemas.name: Sourcify Contract Verification
schemas.description: Verify and lookup Ethereum smart contract source code verification status across multiple chains using Sourcify

getVerificationStatus.description: Check if a contract is verified on Sourcify and get match type (full or partial)

checkByAddresses.description: Check verification status of a contract address across one or multiple chains. Required: addresses, chainIds.

getSourceFileTree.description: Get the list of verified source files for a contract via sourcify — query by chainId and address.

getSourceFiles.description: Get full source code and metadata of a verified contract via sourcify — query by chainId and address.

getSupportedChains.description: Get the list of all chains supported by Sourcify. Returns structured JSON response data.

schemas.name: SPACE ID Web3 Name API
schemas.description: Resolve crypto addresses and domain names via SPACE ID's on-chain resolution API.

getSupportedChains.description: List supported chains and their domain suffixes (static, compiled from docs). via spaceid.

getAddress.description: Resolve domain name to wallet address (e.g. steven.sei → sei1whl4xw...). Required: domain.

getName.description: Resolve wallet address to primary domain name on specified chain. Required: chainid, address.

schemas.name: Stolpersteine Berlin API
schemas.description: Access information about Stolpersteine (memorial stones) in Berlin commemorating victims of Nazi persecution

getAllStones.description: Get all Stolpersteine in Berlin via stolpersteineBerl. Supports limit, offset filters.

searchStones.description: Search Stolpersteine by person name, address, or other criteria. Optional filters: q, name, address, birth_year, death_year, persecution_reason.

getStonesByDistrict.description: Get Stolpersteine in specific Berlin districts via stolpersteineBerl. Supports ortsteil, sort_by filters.

getStonesByPerson.description: Get detailed information about specific victims commemorated by Stolpersteine. Optional filters: person_id, age_at_death, family_group, include_biography.

getStonesByLocation.description: Get Stolpersteine near a specific location or coordinates via stolpersteineBerl. Supports lat, lon, radius filters.

schemas.name: BfS Strahlenschutz ODL API
schemas.description: German Federal Office for Radiation Protection (BfS) ambient dose rate monitoring data via WFS/OGC service with 1685 measuring stations across Germany

getLatestReadings.description: Get the latest 1-hour ambient dose rate readings from all measuring stations. Returns station name, location, radiation value in microsieverts per hour, and measurement timestamp.

getStationTimeseries.description: Get 1-hour radiation timeseries data for a specific station. Use the station kenn value from getLatestReadings as viewparams (e.g. kenn:031020004).

schemas.name: SwaggerHub API
schemas.description: FlowMCP interface for SwaggerHub registry API, supporting search, metadata listing, and Swagger definition retrieval.

searchApis.description: Searches SwaggerHub public APIs using query parameters like `query`, `state`, `tag`, etc.

listApiVersions.description: Returns metadata for all versions of a specified API via swaggerhub — query by owner and api.

schemas.name: TAAPI.IO Technical Indicators
schemas.description: Access 208+ technical analysis indicators (RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, EMA, SMA and more) via the TAAPI.IO REST API

getRSI.description: Get the Relative Strength Index (RSI) for a trading pair via TAAPI. Supports exchange, interval, backtrack filters.

getMACD.description: Get the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) for a trading pair. Required: symbol. Optional filters: exchange, interval, backtrack.

getBollingerBands.description: Get Bollinger Bands (upper, middle, lower) for a trading pair. Required: symbol. Optional filters: exchange, interval, optInTimePeriod.

getEMA.description: Get the Exponential Moving Average (EMA) for a trading pair via TAAPI. Supports exchange, interval, optInTimePeriod filters.

getSMA.description: Get the Simple Moving Average (SMA) for a trading pair via TAAPI. Supports exchange, interval, optInTimePeriod filters.

getStochastic.description: Get Stochastic oscillator (K and D values) for a trading pair. Required: symbol. Optional filters: exchange, interval.

getATR.description: Get the Average True Range (ATR) volatility indicator for a trading pair. Required: symbol. Optional filters: exchange, interval, optInTimePeriod.

getStochRSI.description: Get the Stochastic RSI for a trading pair via TAAPI. Supports exchange, interval filters.

getVWAP.description: Get the Volume Weighted Average Price (VWAP) for a trading pair. Required: symbol. Optional filters: exchange, interval.

getIchimoku.description: Get Ichimoku Cloud indicator values for a trading pair via TAAPI. Supports exchange, interval filters.

schemas.name: Tagesschau API
schemas.description: Access German public broadcasting news from ARD tagesschau including headlines, search, and live channels

getHomepage.description: Get current homepage news with top stories and regional coverage via tagesschau.

getNews.description: Get news articles filtered by region or editorial section (ressort). Optional filters: regions, ressort.

searchArticles.description: Search tagesschau articles by keyword. Supports pageSize, resultPage filters. Returns structured JSON response data.

getChannels.description: Get available live streaming channels (tagesschau24, tagesschau, tagesthemen) Returns structured JSON response data.

schemas.name: Talent Protocol - Advanced Profile Search
schemas.description: Search Profiles with rich filters, sorting, and pagination (page-based or point-in-time).

searchAdvancedProfiles.description: Get profiles that match input query and sort specification via talentprotocol. Supports query, aggregations, returnItems filters.

getDefaultFields.description: Returns the fields that are allowed in customQuery for profiles (paying API keys only).

schemas.name: Tally Governance API
schemas.description: Tally DAO governance API for proposals, delegates, voting power, and Governor contract data via GraphQL

getChains.description: Get all supported blockchain networks for DAO governance on Tally. Returns structured JSON response data.

getGovernors.description: Get Governor contracts (DAOs) by organization. Returns governance details, token info, and proposal stats.

getProposals.description: Get governance proposals with status, votes, and timeline. Filter by governor or organization.

getDelegates.description: Get delegates and their voting power for a specific DAO. Supports filtering by address and sorting.

schemas.name: TED EU Public Procurement API
schemas.description: Tenders Electronic Daily (TED) API providing access to EU public procurement notices with expert query search across all EU member states

searchNotices.description: Search EU public procurement notices using TED expert query syntax. Query examples: 'CY = DEU' (German notices), 'CY = DEU AND PD >= 20260101' (German from Jan 2026), 'ND = 123456-2026' (by number). Country codes: DEU, FRA, ITA, ESP, etc.

schemas.name: Tenderly Public Contracts
schemas.description: Lookup public smart contract information including source code verification, compiler details and token metadata via Tenderly

getPublicContract.description: Get detailed public contract information including compiler version, standards, token info and verification status

schemas.name: UniswapPools
schemas.description: Fetch recently created Uniswap V3 trading pools across multiple blockchains via The Graph — discover new liquidity pools with token pairs and creation timestamps.

getNewPools.description: List new Uniswap V3 pools by chain and order criteria within a time range. Required: chain, orderBy, time_range_seconds, limit.

schemas.name: TheGraphSubgraphTools
schemas.description: Introspect and query The Graph protocol subgraphs — fetch GraphQL schemas and execute arbitrary queries against any hosted subgraph.

getSubgraphSchema.description: Fetch the schema of a subgraph via introspection query via The Graph. Returns structured JSON response data.

querySubgraph.description: Run a raw GraphQL query on a subgraph via The Graph. Returns structured JSON response data.

schemas.name: Twitter Recent Search
schemas.description: Search for Tweets from the last 7 days using the Twitter/X API v2 recent search endpoint. Supports advanced query operators for precise tweet filtering.

searchRecentTweets.description: Search for recent tweets matching a given query via Twitter/X. Returns structured JSON response data.

schemas.name: Umweltbundesamt Air Quality API
schemas.description: German Federal Environment Agency (Umweltbundesamt) air quality data including stations, pollutant measurements, and air quality index

getStations.description: Get all air quality monitoring stations in Germany. Returns station name, location, type, and operating state.

getComponents.description: Get list of measured pollutant components (PM10, NO2, O3, SO2, CO, etc.) with units.

getAirQualityIndex.description: Get the air quality index for all stations at a specific date and time. Returns composite index and individual component values.

getMeasurements.description: Get measurement values for a specific pollutant component at all stations for a date range. Component IDs: 1=PM10, 2=CO, 3=O3, 4=SO2, 5=NO2.

schemas.name: Uniswap Pool Explorer
schemas.description: Query Uniswap V2, V3, and V4 pools for a given token address or pool ID using The Graph subgraphs.

getTokenPools.description: Returns Uniswap V3 pools for a given token address using TheGraph subgraph. Required: token_address, chain.

getPoolData.description: Fetch details for a specific Uniswap pool by ID using TheGraph subgraph. Required: pool_id, chain.

schemas.name: Uniswap V3 Price Server
schemas.description: Exposes tools for price discovery via Uniswap V3 pools, with fallback to CryptoCompare

getSupportedChains.description: Returns a Markdown-formatted list of supported chain IDs and names Returns structured JSON response data.

getTokenPrice.description: Fetches the token's USD price from a Uniswap V3 pool (with 0.3% fee tier) on the specified chain, using fallback to CryptoCompare

schemas.name: VAG Nuernberg Transit API
schemas.description: Real-time public transit data for Nuremberg (VAG) including stops, departures, and service information for buses, trams, and subway

getStops.description: Get all public transit stops in the Nuremberg VGN network. Returns stop name, coordinates, and available transport modes.

getDepartures.description: Get real-time departures for a specific stop. Use VGN stop ID from getStops. Returns line, direction, scheduled and actual departure times.

schemas.name: Web3 Career Job API
schemas.description: Query job listings from the web3.career API with optional filters and markdown output.

queryJobs.description: Returns Markdown-formatted job listings filtered by remote, country, tag, and limit.

schemas.name: Wormhole Metrics API
schemas.description: Query cross-chain bridge metrics from Wormholescan — activity stats, money flow, top assets by volume, top chain pairs, top corridors, and KPI summaries.

getCrossChainActivity.description: Returns cross-chain volume between source and destination chains. Required: timeSpan, by. Optional filters: apps.

getMoneyFlow.description: Returns top money flow data by chain and volume via Wormholescan. Supports from, to, appId filters.

getTopAssetsByVolume.description: Returns top assets by transfer volume via Wormholescan. Returns structured JSON response data.

getTopChainPairsByNumTransfers.description: Returns top chain pairs by number of transfers via Wormholescan. Returns structured JSON response data.

getTopSymbolsByVolume.description: Returns top transferred token symbols by volume via Wormholescan. Returns structured JSON response data.

getTopCorridors.description: Returns top 100 token corridors by number of transfers via Wormholescan. Returns structured JSON response data.

getKpiList.description: Returns Wormhole KPIs including volume, message count, and TVL. via Wormholescan.

schemas.name: x402 Experimental MCP Interface
schemas.description: Test schema for verifying free and paid route behavior under FlowMCP v1.2.0 — includes a free ping endpoint and a paid ping requiring x402 payment headers.

free_ping.description: Simple free route to verify server responsiveness via x402. Returns structured JSON response data.

paid_ping.description: Simulated paid route to test vault access via x402. Returns structured JSON response data.

schemas.name: ZVG Portal Zwangsversteigerungen
schemas.description: Search German foreclosure auctions (Zwangsversteigerungen) from the official ZVG portal of German courts

searchAuctions.description: Search for foreclosure auctions by federal state, court, property type, location, and date range

schemas.name: ZVG Portal Foreclosure Auctions
schemas.description: German foreclosure auction portal (Zwangsversteigerungsportal) for searching property auction listings across all 16 German states. Returns structured data from zvg-portal.de including auction dates, property details, valuations, and court information.

searchAuctions.description: Search foreclosure auction listings by German state (Bundesland). Supports filtering by court, city, ZIP code, street, property type, and auction type. State codes: bw=Baden-Wuerttemberg, by=Bayern, be=Berlin, br=Brandenburg, hb=Bremen, hh=Hamburg, he=Hessen, mv=Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, ni=Niedersachsen, nw=Nordrhein-Westfalen, rp=Rheinland-Pfalz, sl=Saarland, sn=Sachsen, st=Sachsen-Anhalt, sh=Schleswig-Holstein, th=Thueringen. Property types (obj_art): 1=Reihenhaus, 2=Doppelhaushälfte, 3=Einfamilienhaus, 4=Mehrfamilienhaus, 5=ETW 1-2 Zi, 6=ETW 3-4 Zi, 7=ETW 5+ Zi, 8=Gewerbeeinheit, 9=Garage, 10=Kfz-Stellplatz, 13=Wohn-/Geschäftshaus, 14=Gewerbegrundstück, 15=Baugrundstück, 16=Unbebautes Grundstück, 17=Land-/Forstwirtschaft, 18=Sonstiges. Sort (order_by): 2=Termin, 1=Aktualisierung, 3=Aktenzeichen.

getAuctionDetail.description: Get full details of a specific foreclosure auction including property description, valuation (Verkehrswert), court info, auction venue, and links to documents (Bekanntmachung, Exposee, Gutachten, photos). Use the zvg_id and land_abk from searchAuctions results.
